LoginPage.value: object representing the login form overlay

RegularPage.value: base object for each pages where we have title and logout button

annotate.HomePage: object representing home page, this page objects extends RegularPage
annotate.ResultsPage: object representing search results page, this page objects extends RegularPage
annotate.DocumentPage: object representing document view page, this page objects extends RegularPage

getUserNameInput.value: function encapsulating access to user name field

getPasswordInput.value: function encapsulating access to password field

getLoginButton.value: function encapsulating access to login form submit button

getAlertBox.value: function encapsulating access to alert box

annotate.doLogin: login action on login form, this will shorting and simplify test code, each action should return page, after login the home page will be returned
annotate.getSearchForm: this is getter for search form component
annotate.doOpenDocument: open document action will return the document view page
annotate.getSearchResultRow: will return the search result row for specified row no
